sentences.english: And tradition identifies this as the site of Sodom and Gomorrah.
sentences.chinese: 传说认为这里是索多玛城和蛾摩拉城旧址。

sentences.english: A permanent memorial is being planned for the CTV building site.
sentences.chinese: 政府计划在CTV大楼旧址建立永久的纪念碑。

sentences.english: The barracks stand on the site of the old castle.
sentences.chinese: 那个兵营位于古城堡的旧址上。

sentences.english: The background is looking west from the office of Wen Wei Po in Percival Street.
sentences.chinese: 图片的背景是由波斯富街文汇报社旧址向西望。

sentences.english: The museum was built on the original site of Smart Gymnasium of the former Soochow University.
sentences.chinese: 博物馆的馆址为原东吴大学的司马德体育馆旧址。

sentences.english: It was rebuilt on the site of the old building.
sentences.chinese: 它是在原来建筑物的旧址上重新建造的。

sentences.english: The Former Site of The Central Committee of The Chinese Communist Youth League is No. 6 Yuyang Road.
sentences.chinese: 上海团中央旧址位于卢湾区淮海中路渔阳里6号。

sentences.english: Overhead of Agora ruins at Greek-Roman site, Apollonia.
sentences.chinese: 俯视古希腊罗马旧址的广场遗迹，阿波罗尼亚。

sentences.english: The first drive-through pharmacy in Britain has opened in a former McDonald's store.
sentences.chinese: 英国首间得来速药局，已经在一家麦当劳旧址内开幕。

sentences.english: Sansheng Tower in Tianning Temple is located on the old sites of Tianning Temple which is on the east of Qinhuai Road, Qinyang City.
sentences.chinese: 天宁寺三圣塔位于沁阳市覃怀东路天宁寺旧址上。

sentences.english: SUE SLAMEN: At the beautifully restored Old Customs building in Melbourne is the Immigration Museum.
sentences.chinese: 移民博物馆就在修缮一新的墨尔本海关大楼旧址里。

sentences.english: Glastonbury is the traditional site of King Arthur's Isle of Avalon. Population, ', 773.
sentences.chinese: 这里是亚瑟王之阿瓦朗岛旧址。
